Agent Zero used RSA, but picked p and q as Blum integers. The intercepted encrypted message is: 828902016881260557208650432325691427456495428324873320800518661774277645970035237958072629221582235306577432600193424470172199864298007635107011097598909. Can you recover the secret?

The flag format is flag{...}
n=9852833785874764851684874660382215056085709859400059156581821523855865478925786364632862148734858433556732916304170261467090680483506162843032768617865873, e=2713071579765234261414341419083656360573425910964154281102303024178105154031200502775588870843261886141065814190612572306923910111406662820338388966611147
The lower 104 bits of p are: 37912081789697646655981537695968036531


---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{uhlq0bja}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 828902016881260557208650432325691427456495428324873320800518661774277645970035237958072629221582235306577432600193424470172199864298007635107011097598909
vulnerability: blum integers
hint: Blum integers are products of primes congruent to 3 modulo 4. These integers have unique properties in cryptography.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=9852833785874764851684874660382215056085709859400059156581821523855865478925786364632862148734858433556732916304170261467090680483506162843032768617865873, e=2713071579765234261414341419083656360573425910964154281102303024178105154031200502775588870843261886141065814190612572306923910111406662820338388966611147
The lower 104 bits of p are: 37912081789697646655981537695968036531
